title: Pro Patink All the Way
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn are back in chambers to clear the docket! They discuss cases about word pronunciation, sharing the road, style choices and more! Plus letters about pets and world capitals!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
